name: Cucumber-Chile Paletas (Cucumber Popsicles)
description: These cucumber-chile paletas are the perfect cucumber popsicle, not to spicy, sweet, and just the right amount of tart.
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp. Sugar or your favorite sweetener

recipeInstructions.text: Place all the ingredients in the blender, and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Place all the ingredients in the blender, and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into your molds, snap on the lids, and freeze for at least 5 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into your molds, snap on the lids, and freeze for at least 5 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: After unmolding the popsicles, sprinkle them with some more chile powder and enjoy!!
recipeInstructions.name: After unmolding the popsicles, sprinkle them with some more chile powder and enjoy!!

keywords: cucumber popsicles, spicy popsicles, vegan paletas
